trends: There have been no other sightings in Millcreek
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi needed to take a break from my job and decided to step outside to have a cigarette. i exited my place of business at 10:35 p.m. and began to walk across the back parking lot when my eyes caught a really bright white light in between these two radio\tv towers located a little ways from where i actually work in mill creek township up from the mall area. i was alone, and decided to head on over to an area most of us 3rd shifters go for our breaks. it's near the building etc. anyhow, i kept my eyes on this bright white light, at first i thought it was maybe a helicopter or airplane. it isn't usual to spot those at night in our area especially at that time of night. only i kept thinking to myself that it would probably be too dangerous for one of these usual aircrafts to be flying so close in between these two radio\tv towers like that. this light stayed consistent for a couple more seconds then began to dim down and change to a blueish\white kind of light before going back to a very bright constant type of light. another thing i thought was odd was the fact that this light\object did not seem to change its path it just hovered there and continued to do this for another couple of minutes before getting really close to the right radio\tv tower, fade out and completely disappear from the night sky. i continued to stay there for another ten minutes or so scanning the night sky in that direction to see if this object\light would re-appear closer to where i was standing. at this time, i was still hoping that whatever i saw between those two towers would get closer to where i happened to be and reveal to me what exactly it was hence an actual airplane or helicopter but this did not happen. so, i gave up and headed on back into the building and to work. never telling anyone else what i witnessed etc.
Summary: This object held its position between two radio/tv towers
